import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import {useParams, Link} from 'react-router-dom' import apiRequest from './../../../../api/productApi'; const ProductCate = ({products, categories}) => { let { cate_id } = useParams(); const [product, setProduct] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { const getProduct = async () => { try { const { data } = await apiRequest.getProCate(cate_id); setProduct(data) } catch (error) { } } getProduct() }, []) console.log(product.id) return (
